channel.title: South Tucson|Pima County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in South Tucson|Pima County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Metric Signs In Use on I-19 South
item.description: Metric Signs in Use on I-19 South. All distance markers and interchanges marked in kilometers or meters. Mileposts are signed in kilometers. There are mileposts signed as miles that are parallel to the road (signed 90 degrees to the standard signs).

item.title: I-19 South - Exit 99
item.description: I-19 south at Exit 99 - Ajo Way.
